org.springframework.core.style

接口 ToStringStyler

  • 所有已知实现类:
    DefaultToStringStyler

    public interface ToStringStyler
    A strategy interface for pretty-printing toString() methods. Encapsulates the print algorithms; some other object such as a builder should provide the workflow.
    从以下版本开始:
    1.2.2
    作者:
    Keith Donald

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void styleEnd(java.lang.StringBuilder buffer, java.lang.Object obj)
      Style a toString()'ed object after it's fields are styled.
      void styleField(java.lang.StringBuilder buffer, java.lang.String fieldName, java.lang.Object value)
      Style a field value as a string.
      void styleFieldSeparator(java.lang.StringBuilder buffer)
      Style the field separator.
      void styleStart(java.lang.StringBuilder buffer, java.lang.Object obj)
      Style a toString()'ed object before its fields are styled.
      void styleValue(java.lang.StringBuilder buffer, java.lang.Object value)
      Style the given value.

    • 方法详细资料

      • styleStart

        void styleStart(java.lang.StringBuilder buffer,
                java.lang.Object obj)
        Style a toString()'ed object before its fields are styled.
        参数:
        buffer - the buffer to print to
        obj - the object to style

      • styleEnd

        void styleEnd(java.lang.StringBuilder buffer,
              java.lang.Object obj)
        Style a toString()'ed object after it's fields are styled.
        参数:
        buffer - the buffer to print to
        obj - the object to style

      • styleField

        void styleField(java.lang.StringBuilder buffer,
                java.lang.String fieldName,
                @Nullable
                java.lang.Object value)
        Style a field value as a string.
        参数:
        buffer - the buffer to print to
        fieldName - the he name of the field
        value - the field value

      • styleValue

        void styleValue(java.lang.StringBuilder buffer,
                java.lang.Object value)
        Style the given value.
        参数:
        buffer - the buffer to print to
        value - the field value

      • styleFieldSeparator

        void styleFieldSeparator(java.lang.StringBuilder buffer)
        Style the field separator.
        参数:
        buffer - buffer to print to
